definition: to put on a hat/to be first/to dub

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the clinical effect of handing and surgical therapy an fractured crown root complicated with periodontal abscess.

sentences.english: We always instal the crowns 2 to 3 months after the operation.

sentences.english: Accordingly, should produce a tooth seasonable rehabilitate answers when the coronal is misshapen .

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of two different internal investing methods on posteroteeth fixed restorations.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察兩種內包埋方法用於後牙冠橋的質量效果。

sentences.english: A cosmetic temporary crown can often be made to fill the missing space.
sentences.chinese: 可以製作一個美觀的牙冠，來修復牙缺失的間隙。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the conservative repair and treatment of longitudinal fracture of buccal teeth.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討後牙冠根縱折保存修復治療的方法與療效。

sentences.english: Prefabrication of dental crowns for primary dentition and permanent young molars.

sentences.english: The endodontist makes an opening in the crown of the tooth.

to fill a tooth (cavity)/to have a tooth filled/a dental filling
